attributes.action: No more Refugees until every British subject is sheltered
attributes.background: There are thousands of British subjects living rough yet still the government agree to take in more refugees. This is just wrong!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you’re concerned about homelessness and refugees, but we’re not sure what specific action on both issues you would like. 

If you would like the UK Government to do more to tackle homelessness, you might like to sign one of these petitions instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/209683

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208120

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to withdraw from all agreements that require the UK to accept immigrants and refugees, if that's what you'd like to happen.
